name: Reza Fahlevi.
title: I build things for mobile & web.
description: I’m a software engineer specializing in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional digital experiences. Currently, I’m focused on building accessible, health tech products at
work: PT. Global Urban Esensial (Member of Dexa Group)

description: Hello! My name is Reza Fahlevi, 23 years old and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. Web & Mobile Developer with over 3 years experience. Familiar with creating, developing and repairing applications as per requirement and design. Can work in team, adjust SOP or pattern

Fast forward to today, and I have the privilege of working for a health technology company. My primary focus today is building accessible, inclusive products and digital experiences for a wide range of clients.

node.html:
• Implementation PRD (Product Requirement Document) and design into applications.
  • Develop, fix bugs, distribute and be responsible for the Teman Diabetes application
  • Develop, fix bugs on Teman Bumil and D2D applications
  • Write modern, performant, maintainable code for a diverse array of client and internal projects
  • Work with a variety of different languages, platforms, frameworks, and content management systems such as Flutter & React Native
  • Communicate with multi-disciplinary teams of engineers, designers, producers, and clients on a daily basis

• Work with project teams to create user-friendly and attractive interfaces for applications and websites. Customize mock-ups as needed to address the issue at hand.
  • Develop, fix bugs and distribute M-Bike iOS and M-Bike CMS Admin apps.
  • Develop, fix bugs NSAM Tools, Hirest, and Iris
• Analyze, create, develop, fix bugs, and unit test the Telkomsel ICLIMA (Integrated Compliance Management System) application.

• PT. Resik Cemerlang : Delivery Order mobile app
  • PT. Indonesia Comnet Plus : A web application for asset management, lending tools and car loan
  • Hublagram mobile app
  • SMK Assu'udiyyah mobile app
